summary: Simply a minor tweak to the Mehrunes Vengeance sword by CeeTeeDee. All I did was add in a line marking the sword type as Daedric so it can work with perks and game overhaul mods.
descriptionHtml:
Simply a minor tweak to the Mehrunes Vengeance sword by CeeTeeDee. All I did was add in a line marking the sword type as Daedric so it can work with perks and game overhaul mods.

All credit for mod design goes to CeeTeeDee, those who inspired CeeTeeDee, Bethesda, and TES5Edit. All I did was change one line of text.
author: CeeTeeDee
